channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for KS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for KS

item.title: Report E-2024010453
item.description:
Report E-2024010453

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-30T15:10:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-24
  • City: KANSAS CITY
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 4 Gallons of Sulfuric Acid 15% Solution Reagent was released from one 55-gallon plastic drum due to a forklift puncture during loading. The release impacted trailer. No storm drains or waterways are reported to be impacted by the release.

item.title: Report E-2024010478
item.description:
Report E-2024010478

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-30T15:10:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-17
  • City: KANSAS CITY
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: It was reported that approximately 1 gallon of Coleman Camp Fuel (UN1268) was released from (1) 1-gallon pail due to improper loading - no dunnage. The release impacted the trailer. The SDS was reviewed with the caller and it was determined that terminal personnel were capable of cleaning the release with PPE available on site. (1) 10 gallon DM containing cardboard and (1) damaged 1-gallon metal can with some residual product was created as waste and left onsite for the terminal to manage.

item.title: Report X-2024010532
item.description:
Report X-2024010532

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-29T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-16
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PS9 TENDER CALLED IN A LEAKING HAZMAT TO THE DMP. DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND THE LEAKER. RESPONDER CONSULTED WITH THE DECSION TREE ON HOW TO CLEAN UP THE SPILL. RESPONDER CLEANED UP THE SPILL FOLLOWING GUIDELINES AND BROUGHT LEAKER BACK TO THE DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL.
